quotes.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: In the end, only three things matter: how much you loved, how gently you lived, and how gracefully you let go of things not meant for you.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The root of suffering is attachment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The way is not in the sky. The way is in the heart.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Your work is to discover your work and then with all your heart to give yourself to it.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The trouble is, you think you have time.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: To understand everything is to forgive everything.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: A jug fills drop by drop.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think. When the mind is pure, joy follows like a shadow that never leaves.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The greatest prayer is patience.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Every morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The past is already gone, the future is not yet here. There's only one moment for you to live.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: If you light a lamp for somebody, it will also brighten your path.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The tongue like a sharp knife... Kills without drawing blood.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: A man is not called wise because he talks and talks again; but if he is peaceful, loving and fearless then he is in truth called wise.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: When you realize how perfect everything is, you will tilt your head back and laugh at the sky.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The only way to bring peace to the earth is to learn to make our own life peaceful.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Understanding means throwing away your knowledge.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: The seed of suffering in you may be strong, but don't wait until you have no more suffering before allowing yourself to be happy.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: The most precious gift we can offer others is our presence.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: The mind is like water. When it's turbulent, it's difficult to see. When it's calm, everything becomes clear.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: You are the sky. Everything else is just the weather.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The most difficult times for many of us are the ones we give ourselves.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: Nothing ever goes away until it has taught us what we need to know.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The greatest obstacle to connecting with our joy is resentment.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The best way to take care of the future is to take care of the present moment.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The most fundamental aggression to ourselves, the most fundamental harm we can do to ourselves, is to remain ignorant by not having the courage and the respect to look at ourselves honestly and gently.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The essence of bravery is being without self-deception.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The most important point is to accept yourself and stand on your two feet.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: In the beginner's mind there are many possibilities, but in the expert's there are few.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: To study the Buddha Way is to study the self. To study the self is to forget the self. To forget the self is to be enlightened by all things.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.text: If you let go a little, you will have a little peace. If you let go a lot, you will have a lot of peace.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The true value of a human being can be found in the degree to which he has attained liberation from the self.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.text: Everything that has a beginning has an ending. Make your peace with that and all will be well.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: The more you are motivated by love, the more fearless and free your action will be.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: When you do something, you should burn yourself completely, like a good bonfire, leaving no trace of yourself.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: The practice of Zen is forgetting the self in the act of uniting with something.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.text: Try to be mindful, and let things take their natural course. Then your mind will become still in any surroundings, like a clear forest pool.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: In the beginner's mind there are many possibilities, but in the expert's there are few.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: The whole moon and the entire sky are reflected in one dewdrop on the grass.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.text: If you try to see yourself, you will not see anything. If you let go of yourself, you will see everything.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: When you do something, you should burn yourself up completely, like a good bonfire, leaving no trace of yourself.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: To be in harmony with the wholeness of things is not to have anxiety over imperfections.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: The greatest meditation is a mind that lets go.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: If you want to be happy, practice compassion. If you want others to be happy, practice compassion.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: In the end, only three things matter: how much you loved, how gently you lived, and how gracefully you let go of things not meant for you.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The root of suffering is attachment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The way is not in the sky. The way is in the heart.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Your work is to discover your work and then with all your heart to give yourself to it.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The trouble is, you think you have time.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: To understand everything is to forgive everything.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: A jug fills drop by drop.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think. When the mind is pure, joy follows like a shadow that never leaves.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The greatest prayer is patience.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Every morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The past is already gone, the future is not yet here. There's only one moment for you to live.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: If you light a lamp for somebody, it will also brighten your path.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The tongue like a sharp knife... Kills without drawing blood.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: A man is not called wise because he talks and talks again; but if he is peaceful, loving and fearless then he is in truth called wise.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: When you realize how perfect everything is, you will tilt your head back and laugh at the sky.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The only way to bring peace to the earth is to learn to make our own life peaceful.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Understanding means throwing away your knowledge.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: The seed of suffering in you may be strong, but don't wait until you have no more suffering before allowing yourself to be happy.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: The most precious gift we can offer others is our presence.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: The mind is like water. When it's turbulent, it's difficult to see. When it's calm, everything becomes clear.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: You are the sky. Everything else is just the weather.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The most difficult times for many of us are the ones we give ourselves.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: Nothing ever goes away until it has taught us what we need to know.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The greatest obstacle to connecting with our joy is resentment.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The best way to take care of the future is to take care of the present moment.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The most fundamental aggression to ourselves is to remain ignorant by not having the courage to look at ourselves honestly and gently.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The essence of bravery is being without self-deception.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: The most important point is to accept yourself and stand on your two feet.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: In the beginner's mind there are many possibilities, but in the expert's there are few.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: To study the Buddha Way is to study the self. To study the self is to forget the self. To forget the self is to be enlightened by all things.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.text: If you let go a little, you will have a little peace. If you let go a lot, you will have a lot of peace.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The true value of a human being can be found in the degree to which he has attained liberation from the self.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.text: Everything that has a beginning has an ending. Make your peace with that and all will be well.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: The more you are motivated by love, the more fearless and free your action will be.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: When you do something, you should burn yourself completely, like a good bonfire, leaving no trace of yourself.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: The practice of Zen is forgetting the self in the act of uniting with something.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.text: Try to be mindful, and let things take their natural course. Then your mind will become still in any surroundings, like a clear forest pool.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The whole moon and the entire sky are reflected in one dewdrop on the grass.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.text: If you try to see yourself, you will not see anything. If you let go of yourself, you will see everything.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.text: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: When you do something, you should burn yourself up completely, like a good bonfire, leaving no trace of yourself.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.text: To be in harmony with the wholeness of things is not to have anxiety over imperfections.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
